/**
 * LocationList Component
 * 
 * Displays scrollable list of food resource locations
 * Features:
 * - Highlights selected location
 * - Shows count of visible locations
 * - Auto-closes sidebar on mobile when location clicked
 * - Displays empty state when no results match filters
 */import React from'react';import'./LocationList.css';// Human-readable labels for location types
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const typeLabels={foodbank:'Food Bank',community_fridge:'Community Fridge',food_box:'Food Box'};/**
 * @param {Array} locations - Filtered locations to display
 * @param {Function} onLocationClick - Callback when location is selected
 * @param {Object} selectedLocation - Currently selected location (highlighted)
 * @param {Function} onToggleSidebar - Callback to toggle mobile sidebar
 */function LocationList(_ref){let{locations,onLocationClick,selectedLocation,onToggleSidebar}=_ref;// Show empty state when no locations match current filters
if(locations.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"location-list",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"no-results",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No locations match your filters"})})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"location-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"location-count",onClick:onToggleSidebar,children:[locations.length," location",locations.length!==1?'s':''," found"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"location-items",children:locations.map(location=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"location-item ".concat((selectedLocation===null||selectedLocation===void 0?void 0:selectedLocation.id)===location.id?'selected':''),onClick:()=>onLocationClick(location),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"location-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:location.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"location-type type-".concat(location.type),children:typeLabels[location.type]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"location-address",children:["\uD83D\uDCCD ",location.address,", ",location.city]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"location-hours",children:["\uD83D\uDD52 ",location.hours]})]},location.id))})]});}export default LocationList;
